task.title: Enable Users to View the Selected Facets

context.p: You can implement facet filter widget so that users can view the facets selected on the results page. Each selected facet shows as a separate entry in the facet filter widget, and users can remove a facet by clicking X next to it.

The current implementation includes facet filter at the top of the results page by default. If you upgrade from a previous implementation, you can implement facet filter by adding the facet filter widget to the results page.

step.cmd: Add the facet widget filter by adding this line: <rn:widget path="okcs/FacetFilter"/>
